oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest

Interface MVSService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalMVSService, WebMVSService

    public interface MVSService
    This interface provides a way to communicate with MVSuggest service independently of the actual service protocol and location.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MVSQueryRequester createQueryRequester()
      Creates an instance of MVSQueryRequester used to send match requests

      Performs cleanning tasks like removing temporal file.

      Performs the necessary setup before running a job.

    • Method Detail

      • createQueryRequester

        MVSQueryRequester createQueryRequester()
        Creates an instance of MVSQueryRequester used to send match requests
        Returns:

      • environmentCleanup

        void environmentCleanup(Configuration conf)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Performs cleanning tasks like removing temporal file. This method is executed once the job has finished.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • environmentSetup

        void environmentSetup(Configuration conf)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Performs the necessary setup before running a job. This method should be called only once per job, before the job is executed.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getLayers

        java.lang.String[] getLayers()
        Gets the layers indexed by MVSuggest
        Returns:
        an array of layer names

      • getMVSConfig

        MVSConfig getMVSConfig()
        Gets the MVSuggest configuration bean
        Returns:
        the MVsuggest configuration

      • getTemplate

        java.lang.String getTemplate(java.lang.String layer)
        Gets the template content for a single layer
        Parameters:
        layer - the template content in JSON format
        Returns:

      • init

        void init(Configuration conf)
   throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes a single instance per task. This method should be called once per instance.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
